name: mw8-abstrktobjkt
description:
1:1
2021
4950x4950 px

abstrktobjkt. That’s how I’m starting to think of these most recent artworks. 

I don’t want the details of my image to disappear out of the edges of the picture plain, almost like a snap-shot of something much bigger. 

All the visual information that I want to share is here, nothing is out of sight. No FOMO.

In this sense these colours, lines and shapes can be seen as a 2d objkt. 

I’m making a picture of something, an abstrktobjkt.
